messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Gaelic was Re: unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Pronunciation guide: http://www.lincolnu.edu/~focal/index.html Laoghaire - I lean toward -  Lee ga ruh -  with a gutteralish g-sound. My instint is to accent
messages.messageBody:
Pronunciation guide:
http://www.lincolnu.edu/~focal/index.html

Laoghaire - I lean toward - Lee ga ruh - with a gutteralish g-sound.
My instint is to accent the middle sylable but I know that is probably
incorrect, it should be the lead sylable. But I'm no expert.


Bridget
Nollaig Shona -- S�och�in ar domhan,
